entities.name: seer
entities.description: The seer is mentioned as overhearing 509. The text does not provide more information about the seer.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a main character in the story and is paying attention to what happened.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney made the prophecy that altered Harry's life. The text mentions her as having an interview with Dumbledore.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as being part of the prophecy made by Professor Trelawney.

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: Severus Snape interrupted Professor Trelawney's interview with Dumbledore. He was seeking a job at the time.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore had an interview with Professor Trelawney and later gave her a job after being interrupted by Severus Snape.

entities.name: barman
entities.description: The barman is mentioned as standing with Severus Snape and causing a commotion outside the door.

relationships.description: Harry was involved in a prophecy made by Professor Trelawney about him and Voldemort.
Professor Trelawney had an interview with Dumbledore, which was interrupted by Severus Snape.
Severus Snape stood with the barman outside the door.
Dumbledore gave a job to Professor Trelawney after being interrupted by Severus Snape.
